entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron hurtled down it, unable to control their speed but so fast that the Death Eaters’ Stunning Spells ﬂew far over their heads.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters’ Stunning Spells ﬂew far over their heads. They shot through the concealing tapestry at the bottom and spun onto the ﬂoor,

relationships.description: The Death Eaters pursuing them crumpled against it.
“Duro!” cried Hermione, pointing her wand at the tapestry,
